Summary: saw a fast moving object flying very low without lights or sound.
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in the door way of my apartment facing west at about 10pm on 7\24\10. i then saw an object moving very quickly across the sky. it had no lights it was flying lower than airplanes or helicopters and made no sound it looked like it was flying along the coast line moving south to north about 1.5 miles away. at first i thought it might be a kite or balloons but when i steped out side to look closer it was flying very straight and very fast. my view was then obstructed because of palm trees in my front yard as i was walking around them i saw the object clearly for a few more seconds. it looked like it had wings pointed downward and a short body. im sorry to say it. it looked like something from startrek. the object then moved out of my view. it was a clear night with the moon almost full and it was 10pm on saturday someone else must have seen it.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Costa Mesa
There were no other sightings in Costa Mesa on or around July 24th 2010
